articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Israel’s war on Gaza: List of key events, day 97 - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: The ICJ will begin its hearings in South Africa’s genocide case against Israel on Thursday amid its attacks in Gaza.
articles.content:
Heres how things stand on Thursday, January 11, 2024:
<ul><li>UNs top court, the International Court of Justice (ICJ), will open hearings on Thursday in South Africas genocide case filed against Isr… [+2736 chars]
